title: 712 - Goodbye Climb-In Closet
description:
Climb in as I say goodnight to the place where all the sleepy stuff started, rest and I’ll be sifting through my feelings.


(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new websitehttp://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:00)


Make sure to listen to Season 3 of "Within the Wires”

  • Within the Wires is a fiction podcast that tells its story through found audio from an alternate universe.

  • Season 3, which just started, is a political thriller set in 1950s Chicago told exclusively through dictated letters and notes from a bureaucrat to his secretary.

  • Every season takes place in the same universe, but you can start in at season 3 without missing a beat.

  • Past seasons told stories through relaxation tapes and museum audio guides.

  • Find Within the Wires in your favorite podcast app, or at withinthewires.com.
